body: Tieflings are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial HD. They have the following racial traits.
name: Tiefling

sections.body: Tieflings are quick in body and mind, but are inherently strange.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, -2 Charisma

sections.body: Tieflings see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Tieflings have a +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Stealth checks.
sections.name: Skilled

sections.body: Tieflings can use darkness once per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability equals the tiefling's class level.
sections.name: Spell-Like Ability

sections.body: Tieflings have cold resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and fire resistance 5.
sections.name: Fiendish Resistance

sections.body: Tieflings begin play speaking Common and either Abyssal or Infernal. Tieflings with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following: Abyssal, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Infernal, and Orc.
sections.name: Languages
